notifications.title: S-RCS v1.3.0 Released!
notifications.message: New version includes Task Management System, Audit Logging, and improved Security Lock mechanism. Update your installation to get the latest features!

notifications.title: Security Lock Mechanism
notifications.message: The installation wizard now uses a file-based security lock. After installation, delete config/.installed to reinstall.

notifications.title: Welcome to S-RCS
notifications.message: Thank you for using S-RCS! For support, visit our GitHub page or contact us directly.
